description: Author and podcast host Amanda Montell says our brains are overloaded with a constant stream of information that stokes our innate tendency to believe conspiracy theories and mysticism.
title: 'Magical Overthinking' author says information overload can stoke irrational thoughts

description: The men's Huskies team is the first to win the NCAA basketball tournament back-to-back since the University of Florida in 2006 and 2007.
title: The UConn men's basketball team has won back-to-back NCAA championships
